devdoc.details: Router implementation with functions to interact with xDAI on Gnosis Chain.

params.collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 used as collateral
params.conditionId: The id of the condition used to redeem
params.indexSet: Index set of the outcome collection to combine with the parent outcome collection
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id

params.collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 used as collateral
params.conditionId: The id of the condition used to redeem
params.indexSet: Index set of the outcome collection to combine with the parent outcome collection
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id

returns._0: An array of outcomes where a true value indicates that the outcome is redeemable

mergePositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,u.details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory

params.amount: The amount of outcome tokens to merge
params.collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 used as collateral
params.conditionId: The id of the condition to merge
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id
params.partition: An array of disjoint index sets used to merge the positions

mergeToBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[],ui.details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory

params.amount: The amount of outcome tokens to merge
params.conditionId: The id of the condition to merge
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id
params.partition: An array of disjoint index sets used to merge the positions

redeemPositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,.details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory.

params.collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 used as collateral
params.conditionId: The id of the condition used to redeem
params.indexSets: The index sets of the outcomes to redeem
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id

redeemToBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[]).details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory.

params.conditionId: The id of the condition used to redeem
params.indexSets: The index sets of the outcomes to redeem
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id

splitFromBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[]).details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory

params.conditionId: The id of the condition to split
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id
params.partition: An array of disjoint index sets used to split the position

splitPosition(address,bytes32,bytes32,ui.details: The ERC20 associated to each outcome must be previously created on the wrappedERC20Factory

params.amount: The amount of collateral to split.
params.collateralToken: The address of the ERC20 used as collateral
params.conditionId: The id of the condition to split
params.parentCollectionId: The Conditional Tokens parent collection id
params.partition: An array of disjoint index sets used to split the position

getTokenAddress(address,bytes32,bytes32,.notice: Returns the address of the ERC-20 associated to the ERC-1155 outcome token.

getTokenId(address,bytes32,bytes32,uint2.notice: Constructs a tokenId from a collateral token and an outcome collection.

getWinningOutcomes(bytes32).notice: Helper function used to know the redeemable outcomes associated to a conditionId.

mergePositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,u.notice: Merges positions and sends the collateral tokens to the user

mergeToBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[],ui.notice: Merges positions and sends xDAI to the user.

redeemPositions(address,bytes32,bytes32,.notice: Redeems positions and sends the collateral tokens to the user.

redeemToBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[]).notice: Redeems positions and sends xDAI to the user.

splitFromBase(bytes32,bytes32,uint256[]).notice: Splits a position using xDAI and sends the ERC20 outcome tokens back to the user

splitPosition(address,bytes32,bytes32,ui.notice: Transfers the collateral to the Router, splits the position and sends the ERC20 outcome tokens back to the user
